value:
$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|We're close! Eitri's grove should
be just ahead!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|What's the sage like, I wonder...
From the sound of it, I'm betting
he has a long, long beard!$k$p...I'm excited to meet him! What do
you think he'll be like, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hm? What are you— Ah! Look out,
$Nu!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_SWING_H|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$SspSE_BATTLE_DAMAGE0|$Fi500|$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Quite the dodge you managed there.
I see now how you've been able to
elude Ótr thus far.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Who are you?!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Fáfnir, king of this realm, Niðavellir.
I've come to greet those who bested
my brother and seduced my sister.$k$p$EFace_Cool|It appears you're stronger than
expected. Maybe you'll be able
to offer me some entertainment.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Entertainment, hm? You know Reginn
is in our company, don't you?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Brother, I—$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Save your breath, Reginn. Ótr told
me everything. Think you can just
join up with Askr, do you?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Brother, the fighting has to stop!
It only brings suffering! I...I want
my gentle brother back.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|Hmph. The strong rule the weak.
That is the natural order, is it not?$k$pUncivilized louts should kneel and
submit to me. What could make one
happier than knowing their place?$k$p$EFace_Cool|Permit me to demonstrate exactly
where your place is! AHAHAHA!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Lout?! How rude! I'd never kneel
before someone who treated others
with such disrespect!$k$p

$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You're wrong. I can't accept that!
And it's not only other kingdoms
that suffer from our campaigns...$k$p$EFace_Cool|The constant war hurts the people
of Niðavellir too! Can't you see
that, Brother?!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Who brought peace to Niðavellir,
ending the long, bloody struggle?
As I recall, it was me.$k$p$EFace_Smile|And now I bring peace to everyone
everywhere. The people should be
rejoicing, and you along with them.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|King Fáfnir! A kingdom does not exist
without its people, and neither are
your property, even as king!$k$pWhether you are blind to that fact
or refuse to acknowledge it, you
have no right to lead!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Smile2|Heh...ha...AHAHAHA! You think the
lectures of a self-righteous little prig
would change my mind?$k$p$EFace_Cool|Your parentage is what won you your
crown, sweet prince. What could you
possibly know of the right to rule?$k$pTo rule is to do violence. And as your
ruler, I will exercise my right to take
your life here and now!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE16_08,0|$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Gyaaaaahh!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We... There's no way...
H-he can't...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|He's a monster! He's too strong!$k$p

$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Smile2|AHAHAHA! Was that all? And after
I came all this way... Shameful.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Reginn, did you really throw in with
this sorry lot in hopes of stopping
me? Sad...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Fáf...nir... Brother...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Smile|And who's this now? I suppose you
must be our sweet prince's sister?
What pretty eyes you have...$k$pHow do you imagine your brother
would react if I plucked them out
and fed them to him...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Nyaaahh! D-don't touch me!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Broth...er! Stop!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|Enough with the— Ahhh! You must
be the summoner I've heard so much
about...aren't you?$k$p$EFace_Smile|They say you're the savior of Askr.
There's something I've always
wondered. Maybe you can answer.$k$pWhat does a savior's heart look like
when it's been freed from the chest?
Any different, you think?$k$pLet's find out together, shall we?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Stop! I won't let you lay a finger
on $Nu!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Who—?!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Everyone to my grove and into the
shrine—now!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Eitri!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait—that GIRL is the sage?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|This way! Quick, while we still
can, $Nu!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Eitri! You dare oppose me?!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Fáfnir, you are an abomination.
I can stand by no longer.$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$Fi500|Tch. Gone... Impudent brat.
Nothing to do but withdraw
for the moment, then.$k$p$EFace_Cool|With her helping the Askr whelps,
crushing them all might be worth
the wait. AHAHAHA!$k$p$Sbs150|
